inventory=[{"type": "knowledge_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "red_sandstone_wall", "quantity": 10, "index": 15}, {"type": "furnace_minecart", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "magenta_stained_glass", "quantity": 53, "index": 20}, {"type": "stone_stairs", "quantity": 55, "index": 22}, {"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "iron_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "red_wool", "quantity": 15, "index": 28}, {"type": "polished_granite", "quantity": 6, "index": 31}]
thought: To craft polished_granite_stairs, I need to move 3 polished_granite blocks into the crafting table. I will start by moving the first polished_granite block from slot 31 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1
